messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: I am not a career politician. I've lived and worked in Lincolnshire for much of my life, serving our country in the Armed Forces and running a series of successful businesses. I have the skills, passion and honesty to represent you in the way that you deserve. I am standing for election because of you, or more, I am not standing because I want to serve you with more effective local policing, better resourced NHS, supporting local enterprise and employment, and building a better future for everyone.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am not a career politician. I've lived and worked in Lincolnshire for much of my life, serving our country in the Armed Forces and running a series of successful businesses. I have the skills, passion and honesty to represent you in the way that you deserve. I am standing for election because of you, or more, I am not standing because I want to serve you with more effective local policing, better resourced NHS, supporting local enterprise and employment, and building a better future for everyone.

images.caption: Image of JOHN SAXON with UK INDEPENDENCE PARTY branding and the phrases 'BELIEVE in BRITAIN' and 'Standing Up for Real change'.
